Title: CodeEmitter utility
Description: Add CodeEmitter with indentation and block helpers for code generators.
Acceptance: Emitter unit tests validate indentation and block formatting.

Title: Generator refactor
Description: Refactor C/IEC generators to use CodeEmitter while preserving output.
Acceptance: Golden output tests pass with no regression for fixtures.
Test_Method: cmake --build build-wsl | ctest --test-dir build-wsl -R CodegenRegressionTest --output-on-failure | ctest --test-dir build-wsl --output-on-failure
Files: stage4/stage4_emitter.hh | stage4/generate_c/generate_c.cc | stage4/generate_iec/generate_iec.cc | tests/e2e/test_codegen_regression.cc | tests/fixtures/codegen/POUS.c | tests/fixtures/codegen/POUS.h | tests/fixtures/codegen/simple_program.iec | tests/CMakeLists.txt
